title: Bahy Website and Intranet
description: As an intern, I developed the Bahy platform, enhancing user interaction with new features, including a system for discovering and applying to offers, thus improving the overall experience.
introduction: During my internship, I contributed to the digital transformation project of Bahy, an innovative platform designed to strengthen the ties between stakeholders and training schools. My role was to design and develop an online solution that improves the interaction between the stakeholders through advanced features, making it easier for them to discover and apply for training offers. In parallel, I was also in charge of creating a complete intranet for Bahy, aimed at optimizing internal management, communication, and data analysis, ensuring a smooth and efficient management of daily operations.
needs:
• Platform Adoption


    Ensure a quick and effective adoption of the platform by the targeted users, requiring an intuitive interface and features that precisely meet their needs.

  • Security and Privacy


    Guarantee the security of data and the confidentiality of information exchanged between all stakeholders involved.

  • Integration of Advanced Features


    Incorporate innovative technological solutions to support the complex features of the platform and intranet, while maintaining optimal performance.

  • Development of a Dashboard for Stakeholders


    Provide stakeholders with a personalized dashboard for precise tracking of their applications, training, and access to detailed statistics, to maximize their engagement and satisfaction.
solutions:
• UX/UI Design


    A clean and responsive user interface was developed to facilitate navigation and enhance the user experience, for both stakeholders and training schools.

  • Application Platform


    A simplified system allowing users to easily discover training offers and apply with a few clicks was integrated, aiming to make the process more accessible and efficient.

  • Complete Intranet


    An intranet was set up for Bahy, offering content management features, tracking of stakeholders, access to important documents, and visualization of detailed statistics, thus facilitating informed decision-making.

  • Dashboard for Stakeholders


    Special attention was given to the development of a personalized dashboard for stakeholders. This dashboard offers immediate access to key information, such as training opportunities, ongoing applications, as well as personalized analyses and statistics. The goal was to provide stakeholders with the necessary tools to effectively manage their applications and interactions with schools, thereby improving their overall experience on the platform.
challenges:
• Platform Adoption


    Ensure a quick and effective adoption by targeted users, with an intuitive interface and features that precisely meet their expectations.

  • Security and Privacy


    Guarantee the security of data and the confidentiality of information exchanged between all stakeholders involved.

  • Integration of Advanced Features


    Incorporate cutting-edge technological solutions to support the complex features of the platform and intranet, ensuring optimal performance.

title: E-Prepa E-Learning Platform
description: During my internship, I developed E-Prepa, an e-learning platform for DCG and DSCG diplomas, offering flexibility and quality resources for professional success.
introduction: Identifying the need for access to quality and flexible training for students and professionals aspiring to obtain DCG and DSCG diplomas, I developed E-Prepa. This initiative was motivated by the desire to break down traditional barriers to education and offer a platform where learning can be both accessible and adaptive. My role was crucial in the design, development, and deployment of this online platform, integrating innovative tools and resources to enrich the learning experience.
needs:
• Accessibility and Flexibility


    Offer a learning solution that adapts to the busy schedules of students and professionals, allowing access at any time and from any place.

  • Quality of Educational Resources


    Ensure the availability of high-quality educational content, designed by experts in the fields of DCG and DSCG.

  • Learner Engagement and Retention


    Create an engaging user experience to foster motivation and retention among learners.

  • Evaluation and Progress Tracking


    Integrate evaluation and tracking mechanisms that allow learners to measure their progress.
solutions:
• Adaptive E-Learning Platform


    Development of an intuitive user interface offering easy access to a vast library of educational resources, interactive courses, and exam simulations.

  • High-Quality Content


    Collaboration with domain experts for the creation and validation of all educational content, ensuring its relevance and quality.

  • Interactive Engagement Tools


    Integration of interactive features such as quizzes, discussion forums, and live review sessions to increase learner engagement.

  • Personalized Tracking System


    Implementation of a personalized dashboard for each learner, allowing detailed tracking of progress and identification of areas for improvement.
challenges:
• Ensuring Accessibility on All Devices


    Develop a responsive platform that is accessible and performs well on all types of devices, from desktops to smartphones.

  • Maintaining Content Quality


    Manage the challenge of maintaining a high level of quality for all educational content amidst constantly evolving academic and professional standards.

  • Maximizing User Engagement


    Create effective strategies to encourage continuous interaction with the platform and prevent course dropout.

title: Nysa
description: As a freelancer, I created Nysa, a mobile app for easily exploring global events, improving access to local and international cultural and social experiences for users.
introduction: The Nysa initiative arose from the client's desire to connect people with events around them, making it easier to discover and access a variety of events, from local concerts to international festivals. As the designer and developer, my goal was to create a mobile app that not only highlights events of all kinds but also provides a smooth and engaging user experience.
needs:
• Accessibility and Discovery


    Enable users to easily discover events through a clear interface and advanced search functionalities.

  • Intuitive User Experience


    Provide a flawless user experience, with smooth interactions and intuitive navigation.

  • Social Integration


    Facilitate event sharing and participation among friends, thereby strengthening social bonds.

  • Real-Time Updates


    Ensure continuous updating of event information to offer accurate and up-to-date data.
solutions:
• Modern UX/UI Design


    An attractive and modern UX/UI design was developed to facilitate navigation and make event discovery more enjoyable.

  • Advanced Search System


    Implementation of a robust search system allowing users to filter events by various criteria, such as location, event type, and date.

  • Social Features Integration


    Addition of social features to enable users to share events with friends and see which events their network is interested in.

  • Notifications and Updates


    Setting up a notification system to inform users of new events and important updates regarding their favorite events.
challenges:
• Creating a Comprehensive Event Database


    Compiling an exhaustive database of events requiring close collaboration with local and international event organizers.

  • Optimizing Performance


    Ensuring smooth application performance despite integrating numerous features and a large volume of data.

  • User Engagement


    Developing strategies to encourage user engagement and promote social interaction within the app.
